price: እነዚያም የካዱት ሰማያትና ምድር የተጣበቁ የነበሩና የለያየናቸው መኾናችንን አያውቁምን? ሕያው የኾነንም ነገር ሁሉ ከውሃ ፈጠርን፡፡ አያምኑምን ?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ كَانَتَا رَتۡقٗا فَفَتَقۡنَٰهُمَاۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ حَيٍّۚ أَفَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalam yara alladhīna kafarū anna al-samāwāti wal-arḍa kānatā ratqan fafataqnāhumā wajaʿalnā mina al-māi kulla shayin ḥayyin afalā yu'minūna
